programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: A boozy, world-weary NYPD cop (Bruce Willis) must outwit rogue officers planning to kill a witness (Mos Def) who is set to testify against them.

programme.title: Amos & Andrew
programme.desc: A car thief (Nicolas Cage) helps inept police (Dabney Coleman) when they overreact to reports of a burglar in the home of an author (Samuel L. Jackson) in an exclusive neighborhood.

programme.title: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
programme.desc: A nightclub owner finds himself in hot water when he refuses to sell his club to the local mob; the lunar gangsters are helping the mysterious Rex Crater mastermind a plan to take over the moon.

programme.title: Panic in Echo Park
programme.desc: A physician fights hospital and city authorities to find the source of an apparent epidemic in a minority community.

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mobsters send a man to collect from a Hollywood filmmaker who owes them money.

programme.title: Bone: A Bad Day In Beverly Hills
programme.desc: A potential rapist (Yaphet Kotto) enters a Beverly Hills home and sends the husband (Andrew Duggan) to the bank while he stays with the wife (Joyce Van Patten).

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Freddie Jackson sings, A Tribe Called Quest perform, and Ed Alonzo does a comedy-magic act.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Lalah Hathaway sings, The Afros perform, and comedy from Ted Carpenter.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host Sinbad; musical guests Mariah Carey and Steel Pulse; comics Keith Robinson and Will E.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Salt-N-Pepa perform, The Black Flames sing, Lewis Dix and Andre Covington are the week's comedians.

programme.title: Freedom Road
programme.desc: A former slave and soldier (Muhammad Ali) becomes a U.S. senator from South Carolina after the Civil War.

programme.title: A Hero Ain't Nothin' but a Sandwich
programme.desc: A troubled boy becomes addicted to heroin, and his mother and foster father help him fight it.

programme.title: Revival!
programme.desc: A musical recounting of the Gospel of St. John.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Patrice is suing Tiffany for stealing her husband and destroying her happy marriage of 20 years; Patrice claims Tiffany is nothing but a gold digger; Tiffany claims she never knew her boyfriend of ten months was married.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Adam says the friendship between Debbie and Julie was the cause of the majority of their fights and ultimately their break-up; Debbie says her friend, Julie, is a great friend and encouraged her to know her worth and finally break up with Adam.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Dax is married to Stephanie's sister, Liz; Stephanie says she was cut off by Dax, causing her to hit his car; Stephanie says not only did Dax not pay for the damage to her car, but Dax left her pregnant sister for the mystery woman in his car.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Ellen is suing Bobby, the owner of a small bakery after his bakery screwed up a gender reveal cake; the bakery owner claims he's not a doctor and shouldn't be held to a standard that makes him responsible for anything medically related.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Jennie is suing her brother, Charlie, for damage caused when he borrowed her car and took it to an outdoor meetup; Charlie refuses to pay because he said it wasn't his fault; he says Jennie let him use the car and that's what she has insurance for.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Derek and Donna are suing Derek's ex-fianc√©, Kari, for non-refundable wedding costs when she abruptly called off the wedding; Kari says she couldn't be married to Derek and his mother since he always sides with her.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Gregory Fitz and three friends were returning from a night out when two males attempted to rob them.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Keanthony Evans is ambushed while riding his bike; Rashad Charles is killed after a game of dice.

programme.title: Joyful Noise
programme.desc: Two strong-willed singers (Queen Latifah, Dolly Parton) must learn to work in harmony if their Georgia church choir is to stay together and win a national competition.
